name: SOVIETGRAD
description:
CLICK ON THE RESOURCE BUTTONS TO CHANGE BUILDING TYPE

SovietGrad is a citybuilding game where you are tasked to turn a small snowy terrain into a megalopolis!

There's no financial currency therefore you have 4 resources to keep track of instead. Water, propaganda, people and energy all need to be balanced  or else they will be in shortage or surplus of resources causing the system fail. Alongside that you need to keep track of time and space, expanding your land by zones which will fill up quickly considering your buildings are in Tetromino shapes

Controls:

  • M1 to place
  • M2 to rotate
  • scroll wheel to zoom
  • side scroll to move camera

made for the #gmtkjam 2018
